If you're looking for a lighter comedic take on urban legends, check out "The Other Guys" (2010) starring Natalie Zea and Thomas Middleditch. The film features quirky characters and a witty plot that will leave you entertained.

For a more enigmatic and thought-provoking film, "Annie Hall" (1977) starring Colleen Dewhurst is a must-watch. The film explores the complex dynamics between a divorced comedian and an aspiring nightclub singer.
